attributes.additional_details:
Dissolve Kirklees Council. It represents a very large geographical area. 
If Huddersfield Borough Council was re-instated, it could concentrate better on the requirements / needs of the people of Huddersfield.
As Huddersfield is such a large town, with a high population, it needs to be governed better, with a local council that can concentrate and address the needs of the Town.
attributes.background: Dissolve Kirklees Council and re-instate Huddersfield Borough Council.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions calling on the Government to unilaterally change local Government structures. Decisions about local governance is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.
